column4: i still can't get my vm window to appear on a windows xp host. i click on the taskbar button, but the window doesn't appear on screen. i know i've asked here before, but i forgot what to try. i'm using 3.0.4 r50677. any ideas?
also i just realized i said that to the wrong channel
however, if anyone can recommend a vm setup for unbuntu, that would be appreciated
you mean a VM app for ubuntu?
or running ubuntu in a VM
yeah virtualbox is great

i can't see the vm window
sorry, don't know anything about virtualbox on windows

my laptop
oh, i can't afford to do that
i can't afford a laptop to run it on
oh, my laptop is my main and only computer
